Container.Name: WurmUnlimited
Container.Overview:
This Docker will download and install SteamCMD. It will also install Wurm Unlimited with or without the Server-ModLauncher and run it. (You can also copy over the 'Creative' or 'Adventure' folder if you want to create a Server with the provided Servertool that comes with the game)
ATTENTION: First Startup can take very long since it downloads the gameserver files!
Update Notice: Simply restart the container if a newer version of the game is available.
You can also run multiple servers with only one SteamCMD directory!

Config.Name: SteamCMD
Config.Description: Container Path: /serverdata/steamcmd

Config.Name: ServerFiles
Config.Description: Container Path: /serverdata/serverfiles

Config.Name: GAME_ID
Config.Description: The GAME_ID that the container download at startup. (https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Dedicated_Servers_List)

Config.Name: Steam-Username
Config.Description: Your Steam username goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Config.Name: Validate Installation
Config.Description: Set the Variable to 'true' if you want to validate the installation otherwise leave it blank.

Config.Name: Steam-Password
Config.Description: Your Steam password goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

Config.Name: UPD1
Config.Description: Container Port: 8766

Config.Name: UDP2
Config.Description: UDP Queryport (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to click an 'Show more settings ...

Config.Name: TCP1
Config.Description: Container Port: 8766

Config.Name: TCP2
Config.Description: TCP Gameport (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new TCP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to click an 'Show more settings ...

Config.Name: Enable Mod Launcher
Config.Description: To enable the Server-ModLauncher set it to 'true' (without quotes) otherwise leave it blank.

Config.Name: Servrname
Config.Description: Name of the Server

Config.Name: Server Password
Config.Description: Server Password to join

Config.Name: Admin Password
Config.Description: Your Admin Password

Config.Name: Max Players
Config.Description: Define the maximum players on the server

Config.Name: GAME_PORT
Config.Description: Container Variable: GAME_PORT

Config.Name: QUERYPORT
Config.Description: Container Variable: WU_QUERYPORT

Config.Name: Homeserver
Config.Description: If set to 'true' (without quotes) Server is a homeserver and belongs to a single kingdom.

Config.Name: HOMEKINGDOM
Config.Description: If you're using the Adventure base, use 1, 2, or 3. || If you're using Creative, use 4. || Kingdom numbers: 0 - No kingdom | 1 - Jen-Kellon | 2 - Mol-Rehan | 3 - Horde of the Summoned | 4 - Freedom

Config.Name: GAME_MODE
Config.Description: Choose between 'Adventure' and 'Creative' (without quotes) or copy your own map to the root of the serverfolder and define the name of the mapfolder here

Config.Name: LOGINSERVER
Config.Description: If set to 'false' the server is intended to connect to another server who is the loginserver.

Config.Name: EPICSETTINGS
